channel.title: Career on Shashank Prasanna
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Shashank Prasanna

item.title: Why I joined Modular AI?
item.description: In the past decade, I’ve had the very good fortune of working for companies that make some of the best and proven developer productivity tools. If you’re an engineer who’s built control systems for rockets, cars or robots you’ve used MATLAB and Simulink. If you’re an AI developer you likely have an NVIDIA GPU at arm’s reach (ssh to AWS EC2 counts as arm’s reach). If you’re a developer running software in production you’ve likely relied on AWS services for their scalability and and reliability for deployment. If you’re an AI researcher there is no better tool than PyTorch to go from research paper to trained model.
